name: ZooZoo
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zoo zoo
des:
In Zoo Zoo there are lots of animal sounds to hear.
If you can’t think of an animal, just say “Random” and Alexa will pick one for you.

Here are some of the animals you can choose:

Alligator
Badger
Barn Owl
Bat
Bear
Bee
Big Foot
Bison
Budgie
Camel
Cat
Cheetah
Chick
Chicken
Chimpanzee
Cockatoo
Cow
Crocodile
Crow
Cuckoo
Dino
Dog
Dolphin
Donkey
Dragon
Duck
Elephant
Flamingo
Fly
Fox
Frog
Goat
Goose
Gorilla
Grizzly Bear
Guinea Pig
Hawk
Hippo
Horse
Hyena
Jackal
Kangaroo
Kid
Kookaburra
Lamb
Lemur
Lion
Llama
Loch Ness Monster
Loon
Macaw
Magpie
Mandrill
Miniature Horse
Monkey
Monster
Moose
Mosquito
Ostrich
Owl
Panda
Parrot
Penguin
Pig
Raccoon
Rat
Rattlesnake
Reindeer
Rooster
Sea Lion
Seagull
Shark
Sheep
Snake
Sparrow
Tiger
Vampire
Wasp
Werewolf
Whale
Wolf
Woodpecker
Zombie

You can try dog, cat and horse breeds too!

Enjoy!

Your favourite animal missing?
-----------------------------------------
If your favourite animal is missing from Zoo Zoo, leave a comment on the Alexa Zoo Zoo Facebook page, or e-mail me at animal.letters@gmail.com, and I’ll try and add it for you!

Feedback
-------------
I hope you’ll love Zoo Zoo. However, if you have any issues, please let me know on the Alexa Zoo Zoo Facebook page, or by e-mail at animal.letters@gmail.com, and I’ll do everything in my power to make it better for you.

More games? 
------------------
If you'd like to see more games by the author, just type "Drew Cosgrove" into the search bar on the Alexa App or Amazon Skills page.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
